column4: hey im having some trouble accessing my porable hard drive  (i have 2) ubuntu is rinning on one of them its installed on that drive however my seccond drive ( the fun one its got the documents and music and movies) it cant detect it it has no troube however recocnizing my mouse of flash drives any ideas???

hey im having some trouble accessing my porable hard drive  (i have 2) ubuntu is rinning on one of them its installed on that drive however my seccond drive ( the fun one its got the documents and music and movies) it cant detect it it has no troube however recocnizing my mouse of flash drives any ideas???
When you plug in the second portable hard drive (I assume it's a USB device) what shows up in /var/log/messages ?
how would i check it?
Specifically, reboot (with the second drive disconnected) ... open a terminal, type "tail -f /var/log/messages", and then plug the drive in.
you could try it without rebooting, if you were sure your USB was OK .
ill try right now
what I'd be worrying about is that the drive partition table has been corrupted.
OK then... what did the "tail" say?
spesificly
you should have gotten some USB connection messages.   Those are NOT happy USB messages.
haha i got muted idk what should i do?
Somehow your USB subsystem has become very confused.  Maybe try rebooting without the disk, then start "tail" and then plug it in?
: what was that code again?
tail -f /var/log/messages
basicly the same thing happened
also i just remembered i had installed 8.04 on that drive also previosly could this be a reason for the problem
ill have to get back to u srry
Not likely to be the reason.  Unless you clobbered the partition table.
try it again in windows, to see if the partition table is trashed.
thnks for the help so far i g2gbye
